mapper.select: select `id`,`enginee_name_award`,`enginee_award_winning_time`,`enginee_awarding_unit`,`pro_id`,`task_id`,`apply_id`,`opt_uid`,`created`,`updated` from ass_oil_pro_enginee_award where pro_id = #{value} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into ass_oil_pro_enginee_award ( `enginee_name_award`, `enginee_award_winning_time`, `enginee_awarding_unit`, `pro_id`, `task_id`, `apply_id`, `opt_uid`, `created`, `updated`, enginee_desc_id ) values ( #{engineeNameAward}, #{engineeAwardWinningTime}, #{engineeAwardingUnit}, #{proId}, #{taskId}, #{applyId}, #{optUid}, now(), #{updated}, #{engineeDescId} )
mapper.delete:
delete from ass_oil_pro_enginee_award where id in
#{id}
